title: Computer Vision Technology for Robotized Wire Harness Assembly. (arXiv:2309.13745v2 [cs.RO] UPDATED)
abstract: Wire harnesses are essential hardware for electronic systems in modern automotive vehicles. With a shift in the automotive industry towards electrification and autonomous driving, more and more automotive electronics are responsible for energy transmission and safety-critical functions such as maneuvering, driver assistance, and safety system. This paradigm shift places more demand on automotive wiring harnesses from the safety perspective and stresses the greater importance of high-quality wire harness assembly in vehicles. However, most of the current operations of wire harness assembly are still performed manually by skilled workers, and some of the manual processes are problematic from different perspectives, such as quality control and ergonomics. There is also a persistent demand in the industry to increase competitiveness and gain market share. Hence, assuring assembly quality while improving ergonomics and optimizing labor costs is desired. translated_title: 机器人化线束装配的计算机视觉技术
translated_abstract: 线束在现代汽车中是电子系统的重要硬件。随着汽车行业向电动化和自动驾驶的转变，越来越多的汽车电子产品负责能量传输和安全关键功能，如操纵、驾驶辅助和安全系统。这种范式转变从安全角度对汽车线束提出更高的要求，并强调了在车辆中的高质量线束装配的重要性。然而，目前大部分线束装配操作仍由熟练工人手动完成，其中一些手动工序从不同的角度存在问题，如质量控制和人体工程学。行业中也持续需求提高竞争力并获得市场份额。因此，希望能在提高人体工程学和优化劳动成本的同时保证装配质量。机器人化装配通过计算机视觉技术实现。
tldr: 该论文介绍了机器人化线束装配的计算机视觉技术，以提高装配质量并优化人体工程学和劳动成本。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces computer vision technology for robotized wire harness assembly, aiming to improve assembly quality and optimize ergonomics and labor costs.
